post.summary: Add a new account to the system.

201.description: The endpoint is working as expected and provide a list of resources.

get.summary: List accounts from the system database.

200.description: The endpoint is working as expected, the account was found and the data was retrieved as expected.

400.description: One or more parameters was incorrect.

404.description: No account was found according to the parameters received.

get.summary: Retrieve one account from the system database by account code identification.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identification code of the account to search for.

200.description: The endpoint is working as expected, the account was found and the data was retrieved as expected.

404.description: The account with the {id} was NOT found.

patch.summary: Update one account on the  system database by account code identification.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identification code of the account to search for.

200.description: The endpoint is working as expected, the account was found and the data was updated as expected.

400.description: One or more parameters was not correct. More details of the error will be provided on the reply content

404.description: The account with the {id} was NOT found.

delete.summary: Delete an account from the system database.
delete.description: When deleting an account it deletes all its movements as well.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identification code of the account to delete.

204.description: The endpoint is working as expected, the account was found and successfully deleted.

404.description: The account with the {id} was NOT found.

get.summary: Tells whether the application is ok.
get.description: Check the system services and reply if everything is alright.

200.description: The endpoint is working as expected and provide a list of resources.

info.title: Basic Banking App
info.description:
Sample banking application built in NestJS
This file can be downloaded on the "api-json" as a json file.

name.description: Account name. MUST be at least 3 characters and could be 50 characters at max.

type.description: Account type. Could be one of the options: "Corrente" or "Poupança".

id.description: Account code identification. Could be used partial numbers. Ex: 10 will return all records with 10 such as 100 and 1000.

type.description: Account type. Could be: "Corrente" or "Poupança". Could be used partial values. Ex: "o" will return all records with both "Corrente" and "Poupança".

balance.description: Account total balance value at the time of the consulting.

count.description: Quantity of itens found on the list.

accounts.description: List of accounts found according to the query parameters.

id.description: An array with the error messages.

code.description: The server situation. Uses the same codes of HTTP CODE responses.
